org.midica.file

Class MidiExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midica.file.Exporter
      • org.midica.file.MidiExporter

  • public class MidiExporter
extends Exporter

    This class is used to export the currently loaded MIDI sequence as a MIDI file.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

    • Method Detail

      • export

        public ExportResult export(java.io.File file)
                    throws ExportException

        Exports a MIDI file.

        Specified by:
        export in class Exporter
        Parameters:
        file - MIDI file.
        Returns:
        Empty data structure (warnings are not used for MIDI exports).
        Throws:
        ExportException - If the file can not be exported correctly.

      • cloneSequence

        private javax.sound.midi.Sequence cloneSequence()
                                         throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

        Creates a modified copy of the loaded sequence. Adds a meta event for the target charset. Removes meta events for all other charset switches. Removes meta events for key presses and key releases.

        Returns:
        copied and modified MIDI Sequence.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - if the new MIDI (copied) sequence cannot be created.

      • convertCharset

        private javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent convertCharset(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent oldEvent,
                                                  java.lang.String text,
                                                  java.lang.String fileCharset,
                                                  int type,
                                                  long tick,
                                                  int trackNum)

        Converts the text of a META message into the target charset.

        Parameters:
        oldEvent - The original MIDI event.
        text - The text of the meta message.
        fileCharset - Last charset, specified in the MIDI stream.
        type - META message type.
        tick - Tickstamp.
        trackNum - Track number.
        Returns:
        the new meta event with the converted text or the original event, if the text cannot be converted.

      • removeCharsetSwitch

        private javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent removeCharsetSwitch(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent oldEvent,
                                                       java.lang.String text,
                                                       int type,
                                                       long tick,
                                                       int trackNum)

        Removes all charset switch tags from the event’s text.

        Parameters:
        oldEvent - The original MIDI event.
        text - The text of the meta message.
        type - META message type.
        tick - Tickstamp.
        trackNum - Track number.
        Returns:
        the new event with the changed text or null if the text is empty after the changes.
